text: I interviewed two local, well-known, highly recommended agents in addition to my Ideal Agent, Lisa.  Both of the "well-known" agents recommend I list my house for $750K and expect to receive an offer of closer to $725K. Lisa consistently valued my house at $850K ($100K over the other 2 agents).  She did not waiver in her assessment throughout my early conversations with her and the other 2 agents.  She was not well-known in my small community and surrounding areas, but I decided to give her a chance.  We had 4 showings the first weekend and received 2 full price offers.  She was present during the appraisal, which was sufficient to support the offer price.  The house closed at full price and on schedule.  This was the most successful, easiest house sale I've ever experienced (and I've had many).  I would highly recommend Lisa.  She provided an independent, (somewhat) outsiders assessment, and SHE WAS RIGHT.  I'm so thankful I trusted her and that she exceeded my expectations and delivered!!

My home sold within half a month of posting, and I got an extraordinary cost. I saved a large number of dollars on commissions by utilizing Ideal Specialist. I would energetically prescribe Ideal Specialist to anybody hoping to sell their home.Here are a few extra bits of knowledge from my own involvement in Ideal Agent: The organization's site is very much planned and simple to utilize. The specialist matching cycle is speedy and simple. Ideal Agent representatives are top-of-the-line and experienced.
